1.0.name: wordpress/wp-email-to-facebook
1.0.description:
This Wordpress plugin will post your blog posts to the Facebook page you may have created for your company, blog, web site, forum, interest or topic. You can specify different Facebook pages for each post category of your Wordpress blog.

The links to your blog can be shortened by one of seven different link shortener services like TinyURL.com and bit.ly.
